divs: Sighting Detailsi woke up in the middle of the night. something made me look out my window. my yard is very dark as i am back up to the mountains so there is never any light behind my house or in my yard. i couldn't take my eyes off of these white lights that were all over the trees on the one side of my yard. at first i thought -is the moon really bright tonight and somehow it leaving a reflection off of maybe a moist tree. the lights were very beautiful and still. it scared me so instead of looking out the window and up in the sky i closed my eyes and went back to sleep. i really didn't know what to think and forgot about it until this evening while watching a show on ufo's. maybe i saw something.
Summary: very bright lights in the trees of my yard
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Oak Park
There were no other sightings in Oak Park on or around March 3rd 2011
